name: zulip
tagline: A team chat platform with threaded conversations
description: Zulip is a self-hosted team chat platform with threaded conversations, topic-based streams, and extensive integrations. It offers web, desktop, and mobile clients, plus a fully managed cloud service for organizations.

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Create public or private streams for teams, projects, or topics with granular permissions

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find messages across all conversations with full-text search including filters for streams and topics

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Compose messages with Markdown, code blocks, LaTeX math, and emoji for expressive communication

features.title: Webhook Support
features.description: Connect with GitHub, Jira, Jenkins, and hundreds of other services using webhooks and bots

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Access conversations from native iOS and Android apps with full feature parity to the web

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Use dedicated desktop applications for Windows, macOS, and Linux with native notifications

features.title: Email Integration
features.description: Receive message notifications via email and reply directly from your inbox
